text: Aurora Seranaj (born 14 May 1984 in Tiranë) is an Albanian footballer who currently plays for Lazio and the Albania national team where she has been captain since the team was founded in 2011.Lazio profile Aurora Serenaj nënshkruan me Lazion ==Career== Seranaj was part of the inaugural Albania national women's team that faced Macedonia on 4 May 2011, where she captained the side and also scored the first goal in the nation's history.Seranaj scores as Albania women make their debut Aurora Seranaj was the first captain of Albania National team. ==References== == External links == * Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Albanian women's footballers Category:Expatriate women's footballers in Italy Category:Expatriate footballers in North Macedonia Category:Women's association football midfielders Category:Footballers from Tirana Category:Albania women's international footballers Category:KFF Tirana AS players
title: Aurora Seranaj
